name: Professor Mutation
description:
A Puzzle/Card game where you play as Professor Mutation. A college professor that fell into a  puddle of radioactive waste and now has the power to mutate his body in many ways. He can grow new arms, see more colors, discover exploding lumps on his back and MUCH MORE. 

An army of evil minions is attacking a park near your house.

 AT NIGHT.  It's a dangerous situation, imagine what could happen if kids played in parks at night. 

Mutate yourself and save the park!

Special Thanks to: Agustin,  Santiago and Thiago

Music by: Trevor Lentz
